register.title: Create loanExchange account
register.passwordStrengthMessage: Use 6 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols.
register.creditorDescription:
As creditor you loan money and earn from percent.
How large this percent is only up to you.
register.debtorDescription:
As debtor you borrow money and pay percent for it.
You can choose among variety of offers.
register.captchaExtra: We must make sure that your are a human.

lastName.minlength: Last Name is required to be at least 1 character.
lastName.maxlength: Last Name cannot be longer than 64 characters.
lastName.pattern: Last Name can only contain letters.

firstName.minlength: First Name is required to be at least 1 character.
firstName.maxlength: First Name cannot be longer than 64 characters.
firstName.pattern: First Name can only contain letters.

password.minlength: Password is required to be at least 6 character.
password.maxlength: Password cannot be longer than 64 characters.
password.wrongPassword: Wrong password. Try again or click Forgot password to reset it.

captcha.required: Please input the captcha you got!

messages.success: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.

error.userexists: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.
error.emailexists: Email is already in use! Please choose another one.
